page.title: 20CREDITS.RESEARCHERS,DRAYTON
page.content: This block for the Domesday Project was compiled,researched and written by the pupils in the first year class of{Drayton Middle School during the summer term,1985.The 31 children were aided and guided by{Mrs. {Terry Blake,}their class teacher,and by{Mr. Robert Blake,}a student at the University of East Anglia on teaching practice as part of the Post Graduate Certificate in Education.Credit must also be given to{Mr.Jan Tanner,}whose familiarity with computers and cameras was invaluable.The children did much of the basic research,particularly on the land survey,while the typing was performed by the staff.The project proved to be rewarding and we all hope that what we have written is both informative and interesting to all those people who read it in the years to come.
